Pineapple Mango Bitstream.description: Hard seltzer, fruited with pineapple and mango.

Quantum Wake.description: Double IPA, hopped with Citra, Ella, and Azacca hops.

Spatial Proximity.description: A Double IPA, double dry hopped with Citra, Motueka, Mosaic, and Idaho gem hops.

Quantum Eraser.description: A sweet pastry stout with marshmallow (trace egg whites), chocolate, and graham crackers.

Perpetual Belgian Triple.description: A Belgian Abbey Triple, made with Belgian malts, blonde candi syrup, and Saaz and Tettnang hops.

Wings.description: 6 jumbo wings cooked extra crispy served with your choice of sauce (or plain).

Nachos.description: Fresh fried tortillas loaded with  pepper jack cheese, peppers, onions, corn, black beans, choice of meat, cilantro and scallions. Served with lime sour cream and roasted tomato salsa.

Mediterranean Salad.description: Arugula, cucumber, pickled onion, marinated tomatoes, tossed in Italian dressing topped with flatbread croutons and shaved pecorino cheese.

Caesar Salad.description: Iceburg lettuce, corn, beans, peppers, and pickled onions, tossed in a cilantro lime vinaigrette. Topped with tofu chorizo, and crunchy tortillas.

Classic American Burger.description: 6oz certified angus smash patty, American cheese, shredded lettuce, burger sauce, thinly sliced onion, pickles on a potato bun.

Hawaii Burger.description: 6oz certified angus smash patty, homemade spam, seared pineapple, teriyaki, cheddar, garlic aioli on a potato bun.
